content: Right. And what if the number of priviledge storage slots is bounded, say 50k priviledged storage slots per shard? That gives an upper bound for all validators, based on the number of shards of course. I guess you still have the witness size issue.

content: well I'd totally be ok with 50k * 32 * 64 ~= 100 MB of global privileged read-only state

author: phabc
content: And what makes the write side more problematic? Because you still need to write to storage these priviledge states?
